summary: The resources under 'biology' encompass various interdisciplinary domains. A prominent article delves into the term 'ecosystem,' tracing its biological origin and its metaphorical application in human organizations like cryptocurrencies and businesses. Highlighting space and time transcendence, it introduces the innovative concept of 'ecosystem architecture,' an approach integrating multiple disciplines to design adaptable human ecosystems.
excerpt: The term ecosystem has evolved beyond biology to describe dynamic, non-bounded human organizations, transcending space and time. Introduction to ecosystem architecture, a multidisciplinary practice.
